features: LETS MAKE EVERYDAY A GOOD HAIR DAY; For healthy, soft, manageable, salon-quality hair. Sulfate free, silicone free and paraben free. Made with Organic Argan oil and scented with sweet orange and lemongrass essential oils
THE PERFECT TRAVEL CONDITIONER; An eco friendly shampoo for men and women. Perfect for traveling, camping, washing up after the gym or a trip to the beach

MADE WITH ORGANIC HERBS TO RESTORE AND STRENGTHEN HAIR; Our conditioner bar includes Organic Nettle, Organic Hibiscus, Organic Horsetail, Organic Chamomile, Organic Calendula and Organic Turmeric. These hair loving herbs are hailed for helping to repair damaged hair, stimulate hair growth, soothing to the scalp and restore the natural luster to the hair. The perfect organic hair care for dry hair, oily hair, and thin hair

MADE IN THE USA; All Aspen Kay Naturals products are made with a whole lot of care & love in the USA. Each of our shampoo and conditioner bars are hand crafted, packaged and labeled by a real person. Nothing is mass produced
EQUIVALENT TO 3 BOTTLES OF LIQUID CONDITIONER; Each of our conditioner bars are equivalent to three, twelve ounce bottles of liquid conditioner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Solid Shampoo Bar Rosemary Mint Conditioner Bar 2 Pack Mini Soap Dish Dead Sea Mud & Charcoal Soap Glow Face Oil Description 100% Soap-free shampoo bar that requires no transitional period. They are gentle on the hair and scalp and are formulated without harsh cleansers, detergents or silicone. These power-house conditioner bars are scented using only 100% pure essential oils and specially formulated with organic argan oil, hibiscus, nettle and horsetail to strengthen and nourish your hair. We recommend that you use our custom sized draining dishes to allow your handmade shampoo and conditioner bars to fully dry between uses. This is a wonderful addition to your natural and organic skincare routine. Our soap is made for all skin types. Our soaps are very versatile and can be used as a face soap, body soap, hand soap or shaving soap for men and women. Our facial oils can help reduce the fine lines of aging because they contain essential nutrients that pass through the skin quickly, preventing water loss and keeping the skin plump and looking healthy. Sulfate-free ✓ ✓ -- ✓ ✓ Silicone-free ✓ ✓ -- ✓ ✓ Handmade in the USA ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty-free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy with this solid conditioner bar. Easy to use, smells great, no bulky bottles to store, and leaves my hair soft. My hair combs out so easy after it’s washed. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: Third time is a charm! I have purchased both the shampoo and conditioner in citrus, rosemary and now the coconut. I really liked the citrus. The smell was light. Shampoo lathered ok and the conditioner was good. I was running low and decided to try the rosemary. I really liked the scent of the shampoo but the conditioner had very little scent. I wasn't sure I liked it as well as the citrus but I really came to like it as well as the citrus. Third time I bought the coconut. This one is the true winner. Shampoo lathers wonderfully and the conditioner is the easiest to apply of the three scents. The true difference is that this one works best on my hair. I have very fine straight color treated hair which tangles easily especially at night. First time using and I woke up with tangle free hair. All of the shampoo and conditioner are a good size. Roughly the size of a palm. I find that both run out around the same time with washing my hair almost every day. Approximately 3 months. The only issue I have is that when the bars get about 2/3 gone they start to crumble. I just softened them up like you would chocolate in a double boiler and poured them in a silicone ice cube tray and was able to completely use up all the bars. The only thing I would like is for the coconut to come in a set like the citrus and rosemary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far working well!
reviews.reviewText: I just bought the conditioner bar the rosemary mint. I used the conditioner bar last night with the little bit of my ethique shampoo bar that’s left. So far I haven’t found a conditioner bar I’m in love with. I have thicker wavy hair that I get a lot of blonde highlights in. This conditioner bar applied much easier than others I’ve tried and didn’t take nearly as much work to get it distributed through my hair. I left it on for about 3-5 minutes and as I washed it out my hair felt very soft (this has not been the case with other conditioner bars so far). After I towel dried my hair I applied a little bit of the conditioner through my hair as a leave in and let it dry overnight. My hair is super soft this morning but still bouncy and not weighed down and a ton of my natural waves are showing. I also really liked the scent and definitely felt some minty tingle in the shower which I like. I will update my review as I use this more if needed. Since I’m almost out of my current shampoo bar I bought the rosemary mint shampoo bar from this brand to try them together. I get itchy dry scalp with many shampoos, so I will definitely report back after I’ve been using both these products. But so far, this conditioner bar has worked the best out of others I’ve tried (ethique, viori, and one other that I got on amazon I can’t remember the brand). Hope I keep getting this soft and bouncy results as I keep going….cause I will be a repeat customer if so. Oh also great packaging, no plastic etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So soft! But lemon Pledge scented! Yeeesh.
reviews.reviewText: My husband says my hair smells exactly like lemon Pledge furniture dust-removal spray. Now that he has said that, it's the only thing I think of when I catch a whiff. NOT what I would choose! If you love that scent, this is for you. (I'd give you mine, even.)That said, my hair tends to feel a bit course and dry, tending to have split ends. My hair is very soft after using this conditioner bar. I have brown hair with copperish highlights that curls into loose springs, or frizzes to rival Einstein's hair texture on bad days. No frizzies this morning after my shower last night. However, the copper shine is not there. My hair doesn't feel heavy at all, but that bright luster isn't there. It does still have a softer sheen.The smell is the deal breaker for me. When using it, it smells very strongly airfreshener lemon, with an undertone of pot. Like a lemon Hi-Chew candy. The pot undertone disappears when the hair is dry, and the lemon scent fades a lot.The feel is very invigorating! It's almost a light mentholated feeling. I shower at night, so this also doesn't work for me. If you are looking for a conditioner that also helps wake you up, this is awesome! Throw this in your gym bag!All in all, if this company could make a more subtle scent and eliminate the menthol feeling, I would be back in a heartbeat! (Can I suggest German chamomile; the fresh crushed plant scent, not a tea; with a hint of Earl Gray tea scent, minus the tannic bit. It would really match with your product in a great way. And it would still be a gender neutral scent.)Please? And thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use with luxurious results
reviews.reviewText: I was previously using the Super Zero shampoo/conditioner bars, which was my first venture into bars. I loved the results with those but the condition was so hard to apply, it just never felt like it was coating my hair and I wound up using it up fast because I was actually using so much. Then, when it got low, it would break apart into smaller pieces which was strangely better. I set out for something better and found this. It smells amazing, very natural and invigorating. It coats the hair so easily and feels instantly moisturizing. My hair feels great and it doesn’t cause any irritation to my sensitive skin/scalp. I will absolutely buy more and look forward to trying the shampoo too.
